mapper.select: select progress_id, progress_type, upload, notice, business_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from trademark.tbl_progress where progress_id = #{progressId}
select progress_id, progress_type, upload, notice, business_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from trademark.tbl_progress limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into trademark.tbl_progress(progress_type, upload, notice, business_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark) values (#{progressType}, #{upload}, #{notice}, #{businessId}, #{createBy}, now(), #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{remark})

insert into trademark.tbl_progress(progress_type, upload,notice, business_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark) values
(#{entity.progressType}, #{entity.upload}, #{entity.notice}, #{entity.businessId}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.remark})

insert into trademark.tbl_progress(progress_type, upload,notice, business_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark) values
(#{entity.progressType}, #{entity.upload},#{entity.notice}, #{entity.businessId}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.remark})
on duplicate key update progress_type = values(progress_type) , upload = values(upload) ,notice = values(notice) , business_id = values(business_id) , create_by = values(create_by) , create_time = values(create_time) , update_by = values(update_by) , update_time = values(update_time) , remark = values(remark)
mapper.update:
update trademark.tbl_progress
progress_type = #{progressType},
upload = #{upload},
notice = #{notice},
business_id = #{businessId},
create_by = #{createBy},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_by = #{updateBy},
remark = #{remark},
update_time = now(),
where progress_id = #{progressId}
